entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus is a portrait of a person who can move between two locations, Grimmauld Place and Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being able to be sent by Snape to look inside the house.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who is currently sitting in the headmaster's office at Hogwarts, possessing Dumbledore's collection of magical instruments. He has the ability to send Phineas Nigellus to look inside the house.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person whose collection of magical instruments, including the stone Pensieve and the Sorting Hat, are being possessed by Snape in his office at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who explains to Ron that Snape could send Phineas Nigellus to look inside the house, but she has thought of a way to prevent this.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who listens to Hermione's explanation and is impressed by her thinking.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who understands what Hermione is explaining and is the subject of their conversation about what else happened today.

relationships.description: Snape has the ability to send Phineas Nigellus to look inside the house.
Hermione owns a handbag that she uses to prevent Snape from sending Phineas Nigellus to look inside the house.
